content: 5 these spaces appear like back bars of the laddered loops slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet to join finish off 72 single_crochet round 7 with yarn d mpc in any single_crochet chain 3 skip 2 mpc x 23 chain 3 skip 2 slip_stitch to starting mpc to join finish off 24 mpc 24 chain-3 round 8 worked only into round 6 skipped sts enclosing the round 7 chain-3 using yarn a starting with a standing single_crochet in the 1st of any pair of round 6 skipped single_crochet 2 single_crochet in single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet skip mpc x 24 slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet to join finish off 96 single_crochet round 9 this round is formed in the same way as round 5 join yarn c with a slip_stitch in any single_crochet chain 8 as qtr ch1 skip 1 qtr chain 1 x 46 skip 1 st pm in next st single_crochet in 7th chain of starting chain chain 8 cut yarn leaving several inches of yarn and pull yarn through 48 qtr of which 1 is still a loose chain-8 48 chain-1 of which 1 is substituted by an single_crochet latch up following the same method as in round 5 finish off 48 laddered loops round 10 starting with a standing stitch and yarn b 2 single_crochet in each chain-1 of round 9 slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet to join do not finish off 96 single_crochet joseph s ladder wreath © 2023 lettice rose 4 round 11 chain 3 as 1st double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in each of next 3 st half_double_crochet in each of next 4 st single_crochet in each of next 9 st half_double_crochet in each of next 4 st
